DataElement.preferredName: Iron Chelation Therapeutic Procedure Last Dose Administered Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The month, day, and year the last dose of iron chelation was administered.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Iron Chelation Therapeutic Procedure Last Dose Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Iron Chelation involves non-covalent coordination bonding between iron and an organic chemical, often as part of an enzyme or protein complex, as in the iron-binding porphyrin group of hemoglobin._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining._A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ObjectClass.preferredName: Iron Chelation Therapeutic Procedure Last Dose
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Iron Chelation involves non-covalent coordination bonding between iron and an organic chemical, often as part of an enzyme or protein complex, as in the iron-binding porphyrin group of hemoglobin.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.:Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.:A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.

Concepts.definition: Iron Chelation involves non-covalent coordination bonding between iron and an organic chemical, often as part of an enzyme or protein complex, as in the iron-binding porphyrin group of hemoglobin.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.
A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created new version associated to different CD and Display Format as part of NMDP Date VD clean up 4/2009. mcooper Corrected def from KM change. AK 3/25/19

ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the date of the last
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the date of the last dose of iron chelation administered?
